title: Who ever composed Ornn's Poem/Song
body:
http://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/region/freljord/?mv=freljord-song

This is so beautifully crafted. I hope this mean that him theme/login screen will be like this because I will immediately download it and sleep to it. Amazing work and I'm excited for the new champion!!!

Edit: I also forgot to ask what language is this? I don't wanna guess and be completely off :L

replies.body:
I guess, the language is the fictional language of Freljord.
It wouldn't be the first time Riot created a new language.

I have russian roots and by listing to it I actually had to think about the russian language, so they clearly took the language of north regions for inspiration.
It's in Ancient Freljordian

When will a champ speak an in-world language for their VO instead of English/spanish/etc.?

And I mean all of their VO, not something like Karma or Illaoi
well we have Gnar >.>
Nah, we all used to talk like that when we were toddlers.
We have karma .. she says some Ionian words .... as well as Xayah ... saying some Vastaya words.... Or do Vastaya speak Ionia's language ??
Xayah does that from time to time in game, she speaks vastayan I believe

You magnificent bastards. I already knew you "created" some fictional languages, but you pushed it as far as make enough of it to write a full song, and actually made someone sing it?! That's awesome.

May I ask how the songstress did it? Did she learn the basics of the language to sing the song, or did she just learn it by heart phonetically?

EDIT: goes without saying, but the song/music/performance are all great, not just the efforts put into the language. :D

>May I ask how the songstress did it? Did she learn the basics of the language to sing the song, or did she just learn it by heart phonetically?

The vocalist likely did it by being of the same origin as most of the words. ;)
Norwegian-Swedish.

Are you sure it isn't in Ancient Norse? :^)

I'm sorry to be so late on the matter, Reav3. 
Since I'm doing a personal research over it, could you provide me with any information over that very language (ancient feljordian, as you're referring to), or any language fully created and developed by Riot Games on the Runeterra Universe? 
I am a very interested linguist with a personal little project, and hope you can help. I haven't been very lucky in finding information about the linguistic aspects of Runeterra whatsoever.

And which languages is that fictive one based upon?
Based on the poem, my senses tells me old Norwegian (Norse)/Swedish.

Is that an actual language system you came up with, grammar vocabs and all, or just something that remotely sounds like it so you could make a fancy song by inventing a few words?

I just wanna know, because if it is the first I'm gonna sign up to the first language course you guys offer.
Its actually  Ancient Frejlordian ^^

Do you have source for this statment?

But yeah, it could ofc be a ancient freljordian as well.

As Reav3 mentioned, its "ancient Freljordian". Which basically is Old norwegian with other influences from older Scandinavian languages, like Swedish or the language of the "Sames". The vocalist is singing the poem and if you're from a western Scandinavian country, you could probably make out some words
